pageContext.claim: “Weeks ago at my direction, the U.S. military launched a flawless precision strike that killed the world's No. 1 terrorist, Qasem Soleimani. He was responsible for murdering and wounding thousands of Americans, and actively planning new attacks, but we stopped him cold.”
pageContext.analysis: The official Pentagon estimate for the number of American soldiers killed in Iraq because of Iran -- which perhaps one could attribute all to Gen. Qasem Soleimani -- is 608.
